snippet: Mr. Danza sings a musical number — and does some tap dancing — from the new Broadway musical, with the show’s composer, Jason Robert Brown, on piano.
abstract: Mr. Danza sings a musical number — and does some tap dancing — from the new Broadway musical, with the show’s composer, Jason Robert Brown, on piano.

headline.main: In Performance: Tony Danza and Jason Robert Brown of 'Honeymoon in Vegas'
